fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: The Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport says that, contrary to what we reported, the Government Art Collection has not provided any paintings or furniture to Dorneywood, the grace-and-favour mansion traditionally offered for the use of chancellors of the exchequer (“Open Dorneywood to the public”, News, 24 Nov, page 6). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
